item.title: Bluetooth
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1I1vxu5qIUM Transmit an electromagnetic wave (binary) with different wavelength eg: 121mm = 1 124mm = 0 the waves send in all directions Bluetooth range: 2.4835GHz - 2.4GHz Divided in different sections (79 channels), each section has a pair of wavelengths representing 0 and 1 the bluetooth range is shared with some other device like a microwave oven like the power of a microwave oven is too large for bluetooth. it may destroy the bluetooth device if you put them inside the microwave oven (danger)
